vega.uplink.pointing

Class PointingBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompositeDataset
      • vega.uplink.pointing.PointingElement
        • vega.uplink.pointing.PointingBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PointingBlockInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ObservationPointingBlock, PointingBlockGSEP, PointingBlockSlew

    public class PointingBlock
extends PointingElement
implements PointingBlockInterface
    A block containing a pointing definition

      • PointingBlock

        public PointingBlock(java.lang.String blockType,
             java.util.Date startDate,
             java.util.Date endDate)
        Creates a pointing block of the given type. The time interval during which the pointing block is valid is specified by the start date and end date
        Parameters:
        blockType - Pointing block type
        startDate - start date of the time interval during which the pointing block is valid
        endDate - start date of the time interval during which the pointing block is valid

      • addMetadata

        public void addMetadata(PointingMetadata newMetadata)
        The child element can have the child elements: is present in the first block of a VSTP and contains the VSTPnumber (three digits with leading zero). contains the maximum position error for this and the following blocks that do not contain an updated position error in metadata. contains the three simple child elements , and . Each element contains a list of maximum position offset along the respective direction. If the length of these lists is longer than 1 then the additional element must be provided that contains a list of times. Each time must have the format YYYYMM- DDTHH:MM:SS[.SSS]Z. The length of the lists in all elements must be the same. can be used to specify the required HGA articulation. optional element for inserting comments. the SGS may use this element to store any information If has no child elements the element may be omitted.
        Specified by:
        addMetadata in interface PointingBlockInterface
        Parameters:
        newMetadata -

      • setMetadata
